name: chieftaincy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the position of leader of a tribe (= a group of people, often of related families, who live together): He was heir to the chieftaincy of a tribe in the south of the country. The continent was divided into thousands of kingdoms and chieftaincies whose systems of government had evolved over centuries.
